body:
Hello everyone, 

I would like to update everyone on the rotation for the 4 day throwback event. We have decided that we will have 4 different rotations, one for each day. Each rotation will have 16 maps, some were just XMLed for this event and some are the fan favorites. Before I reveal the rotations, I would like to thank both PieZ and ProfessorUtonium for their amazing work. 
Day 1 (Dec. 22)
Radiation
Planks
Abandoned Park 1
The Hallow
Castle Adventure
Checkmate
Formorgar 1
Trenchy
Unix
Coconut DTM
Bleened Rings Origins
Mistrock
Senex 1
Minefield
Broken World
Gladiator

Day 2 (Dec. 23)
Gold Rush
Sandstorm
Fissura
Venomous TDM
Clay Wars
Rendezvous
Volcano
Rigor Mortis
Luar: Origins
Curabitur
Justice 1
Boolean 1
Zalidor
Alpha Complex
Ternio
Wasteland

Day 3 (Dec. 24)
Proelium
Candyland
Yellowstone
Campi Erbosi
Crecent:Subtle
Wonderland
Venomous DTM
Titans Origins
Frostbite
Rendezvous 2
Crusade
Dry Heaven 1
Broken Ages
Decay
Diamond Shore
Windmill Plains

Day 4
Senex 3
Quintus Origins
Nordic Holiday
Fantasy
Halcyon
Justice 3
Infurnus
Midnight Relic
Teres
Clearmont 1
Trinity
Encryption
Palm Rust Origins
CherrylandMC
Rendezvous 3
Mystic

I hope you all have fun and all rotations will be updated at midnight EDT.

title: Throwback Event Rotation

replies.body: Thank you to the three of you for putting so much work and effort into this. Should be a fun event.

Of course you put in Quintus last day.
